Subject: Update licensing
Description: Hi Support, How do I update the license for PingCastle. We (not me) have already purchase a new license - got the license, but how do I update the expired license for the MY Products on My Profile (login)? According to the below link, I just click the Licenses tab and update the license. Where do I find the update tab? It is not available under My Products tab. I can only renew the license, not update. https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/Auditor_10.7/page/Content/Auditor/Admin/Settings/Licenses.htm
Solution_Comment__c: issue solved by licensing team, confirmed by customer
